learning_objectives: Understand the fundamentals of Partition tolerance
Apply Partition tolerance in practical scenarios
sections.background: When a partition in the system cannot communicate with other nodes, it does not affect the normal operation of the rest of the system, or the error or loss of part of the system data does not affect the overall operation of the system.

metadata.concept_definition: When a partition in the system cannot communicate with other nodes, it does not affect the normal operation of the rest of the system, or the error or loss of part of the system data does not affect the overall operation of the system.
